topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532e429c6368720c11180000#post_532e429c6368720c11180000
Not really.  The titans are just another gimmick like the dogs from cod and if you expected any way for a video game where you run around in giant mechs blowing the fucking opponents away into paste to be any different from cod you were wrong.

The only way it really is different from call of duty is the free running; I'll admit that's fun, but in the end adding that in isn't really enough to justify buying it.

It's like if someone played call of duty then played hawken and then went, "I can do that; that's easy".

It's not a bad game; it's just your run of the mill generic game that in the competition for most generic game of 2014 had already won the competition but at the last second one of the judges disqualified the game for one of the people who worked on it actually caring about trying to put one iota of something interesting in the game.

Tl:dr; COD + Hawken = Titanfall
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532e478d6368720cca3c0000#post_532e478d6368720cca3c0000
I was replying to the ones about the kids spouting racial slurs. But hey, you're entitled to your opinion, even if I disagree.
topics.author: 513e68eda4c72d4e3b000164

topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532e48706368722fef4d0000#post_532e48706368722fef4d0000
Oh, nvm.
I was semi-joking about kids spouting racial slurs.  I was mocking how 10 year olds get overhyped about whenever a video game is hyped by mass media then log on believing it to be "teh best game evar" and then eternal september happens.

I've seen it happened to several games before; a game community is relaxing and chilling right out the school and then a couple teenagers start making trouble in the neighbourhood.  You get in one little fight and your admin gets scared and forgets about the original consumer base all together for pandering to the squeekers.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532e4a5463687260ad5a0000#post_532e4a5463687260ad5a0000
The sad thing about titanfall is that is has great potential as a franchise and is not a bad game; rather they're trying to be the next call of duty and are trying to take call of duty's place so hard I know exactly where this is going as a franchise.

Titanfall as a franchise could very well save the xboxone, but they're going the route of stalking COD, watching COD shower using a telescope, going through COD's trash and finding it's old clothes and wearing them and even if they dethrone call of duty it'll only be because titanfall will have cod walked down a alleyway by accident with titanfall killing them, skinning them, wearing it's skin like a suit then living out cod's life pretending to be cod after grafting cod's skin to itself.
